product_name: Big Agnes Chimney Creek 6 mtnGLO Tent
long_description: Ample living space and head height are illuminated with built-in mtnGLOTM LED lights in this 6-person, 3-season camping tent. Enjoy campsite comfort and convenience with 2 doors and 2 vestibules.
short_description: Ample living space and head height are illuminated with built-in mtnGLOTM LED lights in this 6-person, 3-season camping tent. Enjoy campsite comfort and convenience with 2 doors and 2 vestibules.
